testcase.name: Launch browser
testcase.system-out: Given Open this URL - "https://www.godaddy.com/"............................passed And Maximize or set size of browser window..................................passed When Get Title of page and validate it with expected value..................passed And Get URL of current page and validate it with expected value.............passed And Get Page source of web page.............................................passed And Validate that page title is present in page source......................passed And check more outcomes.....................................................passed

testcase.name: Title of your scenario
testcase.system-out: And Maximize or set size of browser window..................................passed And setimplicit wait........................................................passed And Click on the first menu link, which is Domains. It will open up a sub-menu, click on the Domain Name Search link from the sub-menu..passed And Get the value of title of Domain Name Search page using Selenium Webdrivers command in your script and print it..passed And Well match value fetched with expected value, if its matched then proceed to next step either failed the test case..passed And Verify that search box is present on the page and its enabled by using selenium commands..passed And Verify that Buy It button is available along with search box............passed And Enter some test value in the search box, like mydomain and click on Buy It button..passed And If domain is available then verify that Add to Cart button is present alongside domain name..passed Then Verify that price of the domain is also displaying alongside domain name..passed
